summary: Adds a Ruby menu and some functions under that.
name: ruby-menu.vim
description:
Currently does the following:

Run the script out of the buffer
Runs RI on a word under cursor
Runs the script using the word under the cursor as an argument
Comment lines
Uncomment lines

Please e-mail with contributions or desires. I will add the appropriate "who did what" to the script
if you contribute.
